caption.p: Annual mentions of “Keeling curve/Curve” in books searched under Google Ngram Viewer. The y- axis shows the yearly percentage of the 2-g “Keeling curve/Curve” of all the 2-g contained in the sample of books written in English and published within the time period 1871–2008.
Source https://books.google.com/ngrams, date of searching: January 14, 2017
